name: vite-plugin-svelte-bind-spread
author: Sanjay Dookhoo
description: A vite plugin for svelte that by default, if a object is spread into a component, it will bind each property in the object as props.

scripts.npm-publish:
npm run build && clean-package && cp .gitignore .npmignore && echo '
/src' >> .npmignore && npm publish && clean-package restore
